description: Works good when it's working, but sometimes it just disappears and I have to reboot to get it to work again. I also can't seem to unmount AWS S3 drives after they are mounted. And some of the configured locations just never open.
summary: Pretty good app, but has some issues

description: initially worked just fine but now give frequent access errors when trying to save files to the mounted folder.

This app saved my potatoes, I purchase the lifetime license, I hope they keep their promise. So far the only drawback was that they do not support Mega cloud drive, I don't like it because I would like to have G drive, Dropbox, One Drive and Mega running on expandrive so I do not need to install other tools, but it saved so I am giving it 5 stars.
I liked using the app for a while, but seems with recent version something does not fit with RHEL8.1. Actually I would be happy to get any command line docu, since GUI is not reliable.
summary: Seems not to fit with RHEL8.1
